text: Cecil Aldary Portocarrero Thiré (May 28, 1943 – October 9, 2020) was a Brazilian actor and director. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. His career began in 1962. He was known for his works in The Guns, A Padroeira and Celebridade. Thiré died on October 9, 2020 from Parkinson's disease-related problems in Rio de Janeiro, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Relação completa das peças nas quais Cecil Thiré participou, como ator e diretor * Enciclopédia Itaú Cultural - verbete Cecil Thiré Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Brazilian theatre directors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Cecil Thiré
